review.title: “Wrong Work Approach”
review.pros: Pros – Employees can directly discuss with Director
review.cons: Cons – No planning at all. Employees have to work on different projects in a single day, because of this, employees cannot concentrate on work. Working hours are very long and employees are forced to stay and work late night several times. Seniors always use to blame on their juniors for every mistake. Working environment is not good.
review.advice-to-management: No, I would not recommend this company to a friend

review.title: “Improper working”
review.pros: Pros – Direct interaction with senior management.
review.cons: Cons – No planning for any work. Management is worse. Working timing is very long and there is no flexibility.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Proper analysis should be done before starting any project.
